zh_CN.DialogText: 一个满面愁容的人坐在门口

en_US.DialogText: A man with a sad face sat at the door

zh_CN.DialogText: 嘿，你呆在别人家门口干什么呢？

en_US.DialogText: Hey, what are you doing at my door?

zh_CN.DialogText: 终于见到你了，之前就在找你。我想让你帮个忙

en_US.DialogText: I finally saw you. I was looking for you before. I want you to do me a favor

zh_CN.DialogText: 所以你是来干什么的，先说我可没有多余的食物。

en_US.DialogText: So what are you doing here? First, I don't have any extra food.

zh_CN.DialogText: 你别误会我，我只是听说你以前是个土木工程师，而我的小屋塌了....

en_US.DialogText: Don't get me wrong. I just heard that you used to be a civil engineer and my cabin collapsed
Those people are talking around again

zh_CN.DialogText: 我寻思：我不过是在一开始帮其他人在地铁站搭了个临时小屋子

en_US.DialogText: I thought：I just helped others build a temporary house at the subway station at the beginning

zh_CN.DialogText: 求你了，我所有的家什和食物都被埋在下面了

en_US.DialogText: Please, all my belongings and food are buried below
